alert.note: Alert for Dorchester (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 8:03PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Dorchester County through 845 PM EDT... At 803 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Saint Leonard, or near Flag Harbor, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Taylors Island around 830 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Madison, Taylors Island, Woolford, Andrews, Church Creek, Bucktown and Wingate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
